room_title: Escape room "The Haunted Mansion" by HD Escape Rooms Denver in Denver
room_description: It is not often that a business is presented with a 130-year-old mansion with a rich history of heartbreak and hauntings. The original owner of the building that HD Escape Rooms’s Denver location sits below was G.V. Kram, one of the lucky few to strike it rich during the gold rush. After he discovered his wife’s infidelity, he buried his fortune in the basement and hanged himself from the basement rafters.
